channel.title: The Masterful King
channel.description:
The Masterful King
**Crowned from:** Mastermind or Cult Leader
**Luck (Passive)** the day you get voted to be king, you cannot be voted, it will appear as you getting voted but it will not work
**Trusted (Passive)** Immune to being occupied, poisoned or bleed unless by a hunter
**Royal finger (Day ability)** Your next vote counts as 2
**Decide fate (Day ability)** Decide if a player will be executed or pardoned
**Royal party (night ability)** make anyone who visits the unseen get occupied, 2 uses
**Secretive exectution (Night ability)** attack somebody, nobody will know you killed them, 3 uses

item.title: The Masterful King
item.dc:creator: Audreyaloy
item.description:
while the cult does not need it
the unseen might need it.

this is because the cl can setup for king, and another cult will become king, except if there is not cult leader.
but if the mm become evil king, he will actually hurt his team.

Read full topic

item.description:
Yup that sounds like a good idea

Of course, Cult doesn’t need it.

item.title: The Masterful King

That’s where I thought he was going with it. Kinda like how psycho king keeps his kills.

item.title: The Masterful King
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
We could make the Mastermind keep the ability to convert when he steps up.

item.title: The Masterful King
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I think the idea is to make having the leader stepping up a better idea. I don’t think this accomplishes that but it tries.

item.title: The Masterful King
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
The Evil King is good enough. What’s the pointing of adding a second evil King?

item.title: The Masterful King
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Foxx:

unless by a hunter

How exactly does the Hunter plan on Wolfing the king?

Read full topic

item.title: The Masterful King
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Foxx:

Luck (Passive) the day you get voted to be king, you cannot be voted, it will appear as you getting voted but it will not work

I don’t understand this one, what if they get the votes needed, will they auto know king is a masterful king?

Foxx:

Trusted (Passive) Immune to being occupied, poisoned or bleed unless by a hunter

I don’t that it should be able to die from BD classes because all kings can’t die from BD classes, like what are the chances a hunter is gonna try to attack a king? Also i think it should be able to die of butler poison

Foxx:

Secretive exectution (Night ability) attack somebody, nobody will know you killed them, 3 uses

this one is too op, something like unseen/cult guards would be better imo or just give it 1 use

Edit: btw I liked secret conversation more than luck, also I liked the royal conversion more than the royal party

Read full topic
